name: Ruth Rutherford, Mr Malarkey and the Woodenickel Warehouse
name_original: Ruth Rutherford, Mr Malarkey and the Woodenickel Warehouse
description:
Play as Ruth Rutherford in this absurd puzzle platformer as she attempts to steal precious oddities from an even odder warehouse! Use a gravity switching button in order to traverse through impossible obstacles. Will you be able to conquer the Woodenickel Warehouse with your goofy sidekick Mr Malarkey?

made by Jameson Danning, Colin Watterson, and Enrico Widodo on the Phaser 3 framework

note: this is more like a demo of what we have in store for the future of this game, stay tuned for more!
